//Author : Jatin Goyal
//codecracker4

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 10007  //NA
#define N 4000
#define tot 10000001
#define ll long long int
#define dt int
#define all(c) c.begin(), c.end()
#define dcl(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define rep(i,a,b) for(dt i=a;i<=(dt)(b);i++)
#define tr(container, it) for(vector<dt> ::iterator it= container.begin(); it!=container.end(); it++)
#define trp(container, it) for(vector<pair<dt,dt> >::iterator it = container.begin(); it!=container.end(); it++)
#define tra(container, it) for(typeof(container.begin()) it = container.begin(); it!=container.end(); it++)
#define cc1(a)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<endl;
#define cc2(a,b)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<" , "<<#b<<": "<<b<< endl;
#define cc3(a,b,c)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<" , "<<#b<<": "<<b<<" , "<<#c<<": "<<c<<endl;
#define cc4(a,b,c,d)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<" , "<<#b<<": "<<b<<" , "<<#c<<": "<<c<<" , "<<#d<<": "<<d<<endl;
#define pr pair<dt,dt>  //NA
#define mp(a,b) make_pair(a,b)
#define pb push_back  //NA
#define gc getchar  //NA
#define F first
#define S second
vector<int>w;
int cur,ok[tot];
int mmpow(int base,int exponent,int mod)
{
    //check for overflow of base,result
    int result=1;
    while(exponent>0)
    {
        if(exponent&1)  result=(result*base)%mod;
        exponent=exponent>>1;
        base=(base*base)%mod;
    }
    return result;
}
int main()
{
	//freopen("##inp.cpp","r",stdin);
    //freopen("##out.cpp","w",stdout);
	//ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);

    w.resize(tot+3);
    w[0]=1;
    w[1]=1;
    for(int i=2;i<=N;i++)
    {
        if(w[i]==0)
        {
            ok[i]+=ok[i-1]+1;
            for(int j=i*2;j<=tot;j=j+i)
            {
                w[j]=1;
            }
        }
        else ok[i]=ok[i-1];
    }

    rep(i,N+1,tot)
    {
        ok[i]+=ok[i-1]+1-w[i];
    }


    rep(i,2,tot) ok[i]--;


    int n;
    while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
    {
        if(n==1) printf("0\n");
        else printf("%d\n",mmpow(2,ok[n],MOD));
    }

}
